thread.title: ECN Capital Schedules Q1-2018 Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: ECN Capital Schedules Q1-2018 Conference Call
text:
TORONTO, May 03, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ECN Capital Corp. (TSX:ECN) (“ECN Capital” or “the Company”), one of North America’s leading finance companies, today announced that it intends to file its financial statements and management discussion and analysis for the three-month period ended March 31, 2018 after markets close on Thursday May 10, 2018.
The Company will host an analyst briefing to discuss these results commencing at 5:30 PM (ET) on Thursday May 10, 2018. The call can be accessed as follows:
Webcast http://services.choruscall.ca/links/ecncapitalcorp20180510.html Toll-free dial in North America 1-800-319-8560
International http://services.choruscall.ca/public/accessnumbers.html
Passcode 47234 Presentation slides http://ecncapitalcorp.com/investors/presentations The webcast will be available until August 10, 2018. A recording of the conference call may also be accessed until June 10, 2018 by dialing 1-800-319-6413 and entering the passcode 2218.
About ECN Capital Corp .
With total owned and managed assets of more than C$5.5 billion, ECN Capital Corp. (TSX: ECN) is one of North America's leading finance companies. ECN Capital operates in four verticals: Home Improvement Finance, Manufactured Housing Finance, Rail Finance and Aviation Finance.
Contact
John Wimsatt
647-649-4634

Source: ECN Capital Corp.
